name: Life Learning Academy
description: Life Learning Academy is a public charter high school serving San Francisco Bay Area students seeking an alternative to large public high schools. The program engages with the most vulnerable students in a supportive learning environment where they want to succeed. Offering curriculum and support: - Building community - Academics - Workforce development - Social-emotional learning - Housing Program - College readiness
